description: On Feb 20th, Explorer's Guide Maritime Academy is offering an OUPV (6 Pack) Captains Course at the Palace Station Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada.  This license is needed to operate vessels carrying paying passengers on US Coast Guard waters.  This includes the ocean and any waterway where you can navigate to the ocean or from one state to another such as Lake Meade, This course is seven days long and covers Maritime law, marlin spike, seamanship, chart plotting, navigation, emergencies, vessels and many other related topics. The course will start on Monday, February 20th and will end on Tuesday February 28th.  Class will be held Monday through Friday then back again on Monday and Tuesday of the following week from 8 am to 5 pm. There will be a First Aid/CPR class offered on Saturday February 25th for those that do not have that certification current to within one year.  (Red Cross, American Heart Assn, or ECSI are the only certifications that are recognized). Sign ups for the First Aid/CPR class will be done directly through the instructor during the course. Location: Palace Station Casino Board Room/Hospitality Room 2411 W Sahara Ave Las Vegas, Nv. 89102   (Classroom location.  Not the business office for this course. See below) Course: OUPV (6 Pack) Inland/Great Lakes (all inland waters in the US).  $645 OUPV (6 Pack) Near Coastal (Includes Inland waters and the ocean in the US).  $695 For more info call Instructor, Captain Phil at show contact info To enroll, co to www.explorersguidellc.com or call show contact info
title: February 6 Pack Captains Course
